mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GY_MATERIAL A WHERE 1=2 AND A.YEAR = #{sch_year}

SELECT A.YEAR , A.DATA_CODE , A.DATA_CODE_NAME , COALESCE(A.COMPANY_ID,'') AS COMPANY_ID , COALESCE(A.STANDARD ,'') AS STANDARD , COALESCE(A.DANGA ,'') AS DANGA , A.UNIT , COALESCE(A.REMARKS ,'') AS REMARKS FROM GY_MATERIAL A WHERE 1=2 AND A.YEAR = #{sch_year} AND A.COMPANY_ID like '%' ||#{sch_company_id} || '%' ORDER BY A.SUNBUN, A.DATA_CODE LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT A.YEAR , A.DATA_CODE , A.DATA_CODE_NAME , COALESCE(A.COMPANY_ID,'') AS COMPANY_ID , COALESCE(A.STANDARD ,'') AS STANDARD , COALESCE(A.DANGA ,'') AS DANGA , A.UNIT , COALESCE(A.REMARKS ,'') AS REMARKS FROM GY_MATERIAL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.YEAR = #{sch_year} AND A.DATA_CODE = #{dataCode} AND A.COMPANY_ID = #{company_id}
